original_title: A Portrait of the Lady in the Yellow Hat
overview: A girl, a hat, a painter, and ensuing developments are presented in a choppy, fast-motion style which lends a clownish air to the film. Each object or situation is followed by explorations into its aesthetic ramifications, revealed with brilliant color, very fast cutting, and multiple superimpositions. â€“S. L.
title: A Portrait of the Lady in the Yellow Hat
